In a photoelectric tachometer, what is the relationship between pulse rate and rotational speed?

answers.a: Pulse rate is directly proportional to speed
answers.b: Pulse rate is inversely proportional to speed
answers.c: Pulse rate remains constant regardless of speed
answers.d: Pulse rate depends only on light intensity

questions.question: Which of the following can help improve accuracy in a photoelectric tachometer?

answers.a: Using fewer holes on the disc

questions.question: What is a significant disadvantage of the photoelectric tachometer?

answers.a: High cost of the opaque disc
answers.b: Limited lifespan of the light source
